name: AARPNowNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Daily news. Relevant stories. More to talk about. 

Add AARP Now’s top headlines to your Flash Briefing for exclusive news and stories written with you and your lifestyle in mind. 

Catch up with a curated daily look at the topics that matter most to you – in less than sixty seconds. 

To get started, just enable the skill, and ask “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” You’ll get a rundown of news curated for the 50+ crowd along with stories from your other news skills. 

To hear AARP news first, go to “Settings > Flash Briefing” in the Alexa app. Tap “Edit Order” and drag AARP Now News to the top of the list.
